name: Baby Boom (itch) (PoulpePalpitant)
description:
Explode your way to victory in this (up to) 4 player local multiplayer immersive baby simulator experience. 

Features
  • Big babies
  • Small babies
  • Door babies?
  • ... and Explosions

We would tell you more about the game, but we're not paid enough, so...

PLAY IT!

It's free. TAKE IT!

Developers

Yvanoski Sanon, Alex Bouchard, Gabriel Kirouac, Laurent Montreuil

Development status: EARLY ACCESS (eventually, we will fix things...) Release : june 2022
